help.mp:
:crossed_swords: Hey! This message was sent because you asked for help.

If you need help, you can join the bot server!

You will be able to be a part of the bot's development and you will get details about it!

https://discord.gg/USnCxg4

If you don't want to join us (:sob:) you can also read the bot's wiki!
https://draftbot.fandom.com/fr/wiki/Commandes
help.main:
here is the list of the available commands:**

```
respawn
ping
profile
report
switch
shop
sell
top
TopWeek
inventory
fight
daily
drink
prefix
```
:arrow_forward: If you want more information about a specific command write: `help [name of the command]` :wink:

:arrow_forward: You can ask for help about badges by writing `help badges`

:arrow_forward: For more help you can visit the bot's wiki! https://draftbot.fandom.com/fr/wiki/Commandes

commands.prefix:
:interrobang: prefix {New prefix} :

Allows you, if you are admin of a server, to change the prefix used by the bot on this server.
commands.ping:
:ping_pong: ping:

Check if the bot is online.

(Note: Time displayed is the response time from the bot, not your ping, a correct ping should be less than 500 ms. :clock1:):
commands.respawn:
:angel: respawn

Lets you continue playing after dying.
commands.profile:
:bust_in_silhouette: profile

Your character's information:

:smiley: Status effects | Nickname | Level :star: XP | :heart: Health | :dagger: Attack | :shield: Armor | :rocket: Speed | :trophy: Ranking | :moneybag: Money | :medal: Points
commands.switch:
:repeat: switch

Switches the item currently in use with the one in your inventory.
commands.fight:
:crossed_swords: fight

Use this command to duel other players on the same server as you.
commands.top:
:trophy: top [page number]

Displays the general ranking of the game in 15 player intervals. Players in the same guild of you are shown by a blue dot.
commands.TopWeek:
:trophy: TopWeek [page number]

Displays the general weekly ranking of the game in pages of 15 players. Players in the same guild as you are shown with a blue dot.
commands.inventory:
:school_satchel: inventory

Shows the items in your inventory, can contain 4 types of objects:
```
-Weapons
-Armors
-Potions
-Items
```
The command also shows the reserve that can contain another type of item temporarily during the time you deliberate whether or not to keep it.

:warning: **The reserve is not to be trusted if you want to keep anything precious**
The items kept in here can be replaced whenever you find a new one.
commands.report:
:newspaper: report

Lets you obtain the resources and intel your character got during your absence.
From time to time, events will be triggered and will necessitate special actions or choices.
commands.sell:
:moneybag: sell

Lets you sell the item currently in your reserve. The value of the item is set to be equal to its power, it can be 0 if the item is not very good :wink:.
commands.daily:
:calendar: daily

Some items give you bonuses daily or monthly. Use this command to obtain said bonuses. You can learn whether or not an item gives you a bonus by using the command `inventory`.
commands.invite:
:inbox_tray: invite

This command allows you to get an invite url to get the bot on your server, or join the support server!
commands.badge:
:military_medal: badges

Badges are rewards very hard to get created to honor people who helped the bot development. The list of available badges is diplayed on the bot's discord server. (you can have the link of the server using the `invite` command)
commands.badges:
:military_medal: badges

Badges are very difficult distinctions to obtain and have been created to reward people who have most supported the development of the bot. The list of available badges is diplayed on the bot's discord server. (you can have the link of the server using the `invite` command)
commands.drink:
:tropical_drink: drink

This command allows you to drink the potion you have. Some potions cannot be drunk and are consumed automatically during a fight.
commands.shop:
:shopping_cart: shop

This command allows you to spend your money to facilitate your adventure. Besides the 4 main choices which are always available, you can buy an exclusive potion every day, available on sale for only 24h.

invite.main: To get the bot on your server, use this link: http://draftbot.tk :smiley:

profile.errorExp: , it seems the player you asked for hasn't started the adventure yet!
profile.notAPlayer: , use the command `report` to start your adventure!

respawn.revived1: **We successfully brought you back to life! However, please note that
respawn.revived2: points :medal: were deducted from your score as a result of this action!
respawn.notDead: ** it seems that you are not yet KO'd... You don't need our services.

admin.error: :x: | You have to be `Admin` on this server to perform this command!

shop.dmIntro: :money_mouth: | The shop's badge was bought by the player:
shop.console: :money_mouth: | The shop badge has been bought by the player:
shop.badgeWarning:
:warning: | Thank you for buying the badge :money_mouth:.

If you got to the point of buying this, it means you've already done quite a bit of playing and I thank you for that. Your badge will be handed to you by a staff member in the next few hours.
shop.noMoney: **, you can't access the shop with debt!

infos.aa: :warning: If you already have a potion in your inventory, it will get replaced by this one with no refund!
infos.a: :warning: You will recieve a random item (Weapon / Armor / Misc or Potion) among all those existing in the game. If you already have an item of higher value than the one created, you will recieve a small monetary compensation.
infos.b: :warning: Your status will be reset and the next report will be available in an hour.
infos.c: :warning: You will be fully healed but your status will stay unchanged.
infos.d: :warning: You will receive the badge in the hours following your payment. For more information on badges, use the command `help badges`

shop.notEnoughEnd: , You don't have enough money to buy this!
shop.tooMuchShop: , The shop is on cooldown. `(If you haven't recently used the command shop or sold anything, wait 2 minutes and try again)`

error.noSpeakPermission:
:zipper_mouth: | **Hello! You are receiving this message because you tried using one of my commands in a channel where I have the permissions to see messages but not send them!**

Your request was thus voided. To resolve this problem, please send a message to the owner of the server you tried to use me in. If you can't resolve this problem, I invite you to join the bot's support available here: 'http://draftbot.tk/'!

errorMain.:smiley: ** it seems you are not inflicted by any bad status!
errorMain.:baby:: ** It looks like you haven't begun to play! To start your adventure, use the `report` command.
errorMain.:dizzy_face:: ** It is unfortunately not possible to continue playing while almost dead! Please wait for the end of the healing of your status.
errorMain.:sick:: ** It is unfortunately not possible to continue playing while hurt or ill! Please wait for the end of the healing of your status.
errorMain.:skull:: ** You are KO'd! You need to respawn using the `respawn` command.
errorMain.:lock:: ** You are currently locked. Please wait for the end of the healing of your status.
errorMain.:zzz:: ** It is unfortunately not possible to continue playing while sleeping! Please wait for the end of the healing of your status.
errorMain.:head_bandage:: ** It is unfortunately not possible to continue playing while hurt! Please wait for the end of the healing of your status.
errorMain.:snowflake:: **  It is unfortunately not possible to continue playing while frozen! Please wait for the end of the healing of your status.
errorMain.:confounded:: ** It is unfortunately not possible to continue playing while confused! Please wait for the end of the healing of your status.
errorMain.:clock10:: ** Another command was used by you recently and is still waiting for instructions! Please terminate the last command before continuing to play. `If there is no other task waiting for instructions, please contact a bot administrator`
errorMain.:clock2:: ** It seems you already have something on your hands! Please wait for the end of the task to continue playing!

playerManager.newItem: **You obtained a new item!** :new: You got:
playerManager.sell: ** You obtain a bag containing some gold coins... It will be useful for the continuation of your adventure! :moneybag: Money obtained: **

levelUp.fightUnlocked: :dagger: | Battle unlocked ! (Use `!fight` to start a battle)

entity.killMessage:
:crossed_swords:  Hey fighter!

Looks like you have been KO'd... :skull:
But thanks to our advanced tech, we were able to modify past events so you avoided that painful death! :tada:
Sadly, it was very pricy, and your total score was impacted by it...

To play again, use `respawn`

events.0:
: ** :mailbox_with_mail: **Welcome!** :crown: The king searches for a mighty knight to marry his daughter and **you** have been chosen to be part of the selection contest! I'll be your partner for this journey, and I'll do my best to help you triumph!
:triangular_flag_on_post: Our goal for this game is to collect as many points as we can, to show the king our might!:muscle: I'll explain how it works...
:notebook_with_decorative_cover: Of course, I won't make a long and monotonous speech, so if you want more details, please use `!help`
So, let's start! It's pretty simple, I'll do whatever you ask! I'm going to collect resources :moneybag: for you while you're gone, and you'll just have to use `!report` to get them. If I ever have problems, I'll ask you what to do and you'll help me continue!

:walking: Let's go!
ü§î I don't really know...

*-Use Discord reactions to accomplish any action :warning: If you don't answer, you'll have to start the tutorial again :wink:.*
events.1:
: ** :deciduous_tree: A tree fell on the path and blocked it!

:scissors: Cut the tree up and continue.
:walking: Go another way.

*-Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.2:
: ** :dog: In front of you, a dog arrives, and circles you. He seems to want you to follow him!

:dog2: Follow the dog.
:runner: Continue without worrying about the dog.

*-Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.3:
: ** :lock: You found a box! But it's closed...

:key: Look around for the key.
:pick: Attack the padlock with a pickaxe.
:arrow_forward: Abandon the box where you found it.

*-Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.4:
: ** :stars: You have decided to enjoy a quiet night to continue your progress. The sky is magnificient and after a few minutes scrutinizing the sky, you observe a shooting star!

:speaking_head: Make a wish.
:runner: Ignore this event.

*-Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.5:
: ** :fountain: You have found a fountain!

:sweat_drops: Rest and drink to regain strength.
:walking: Do not stop and continue on your way.

*-Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.6:
: ** :fork_knife_plate: You had stopped in a cave to eat and you hesitate before leaving... 

:flashlight: Delve deeper into the cave.
:runner: keep going, no time to waste!
:mag: Search the surroundings

*-Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.7:
: ** :house: You discovered a house! It seems abandoned...

:door: Check inside.
:walking: Don't stop and keep going.

*-Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.8:
: ** :mountain_snow: You decided to take advantage of the summer passing through the mountains as long as the passes aren't too snowy, however, the climb is more difficult than expected...

:evergreen_tree: Continue through the fir forest
:park: Forget climbing to the top and stay close to the plains

*- Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.9:
: ** :bust_in_silhouette: In the middle of a field, you meet a farmer. He lost his pitchfork...

:mag_right: Help the farmer to find his pitchfork.
:arrow_forward: Carry on.

*- Use reactions to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.10:
: ** :fish: As you pass a lake, you notice a man who seems to be having difficulties on his fishing trip!

:fishing_pole_and_fish: Offer your help.
:runner: Keep going, no time to waste! 
:hand_splayed: Push the fisherman into the water!

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.11:
: ** :interrobang: As you get ready to enter a forest, a mysterious woman explains there is a shorter path through the west.

:deciduous_tree: Keep going the same way.
:point_left: Follow the advice of the mysterious woman.
:point_right: Avoid the forest by going the opposite way you were told.

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.12:
: ** :park: You see a river in front of you. On the other shore, you catch a glimpse of a village.

:swimmer: Swim across the river.
:rowboat: Try to make a raft.
:bridge_at_night: Look for a bridge further away.
:walking: Go another way.

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.13:
: ** :homes: After spending several weeks walking without any human encounter, you finally enter a small town that seems rather lively.

:house: Go to the inn.
:hammer: Go to the forge.
:circus_tent: Go to the marketplace.
:walking: Leave.

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice!*
events.14:
: ** :house: You arrive at a plain where a single small house stands. As you get closer, you see a man working on an incandescent piece of metal.

:hammer: Chat with the worker
üõè Ask to stay the night to rest and recover
:walking: You don't have time to lose! Continue walking!

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.15:
: ** :cityscape: As you are walking through a town through narrow alleys, you enter what seems to be a small shop where a group of men are quietly chatting.

:busts_in_silhouette: Try trading with them.
:runner: Continue walking without losing time.
 :moneybag: Discreetly take a few coins from the register.

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.16:
: ** :european_castle: After following a small river for hours, you discover what seems to be a abandoned castle by the riverside.

:mag_right: Enter and explore the castle.
:arrow_right: Continue walking
:repeat: Walk around the castle's exterior

*-Use the reactions to execute an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.17:
: ** :stew: Hungry after your day of travel, you decide to stop and look for something to eat around you.

:apple: Climb the huge tree facing you and get fruit from it.
:mushroom: Gather mushrooms.
:salad: Make a salad with the plants you find.
:deer: Attempt to hunt a wild animal
:walking: Forget eating here. Leave in hopes of finding a better place to eat.

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.18:
: ** :house_abandoned: You arrive at a city without finding anyone. After crossing you spot a building site that also seems deserted.

:mag_right: Search the building site.
:chains: Search the scaffolding.
:walking: Move on without worrying.

*- Use reactions to take an action :warning: Not responding is considered a separate choice.*
events.19:
: ** :fox: After many days without sustenance, you see a dead fox on the side of the road, looking fresh. 

:fork_knife_plate: Try to cook the fox
:walking: Simply ignore it and hurry to the nearest inn
:knife: Butcher the fox and resell its skin.

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is consided a separate choice!*
events.20:
: ** :bust_in_silhouette: while walking peacefully in a village, you see a guard stealing from a poor woman.

:punch: Attack the guard to help the lady.
:walking: Keep walking.
:call_me: Contact another guard and warn them of the corrupt guard.

*- Use the reactions for make an action :warning: Not answering is also considered an action!*
events.21:
: ** :bridge_at_night: Continuing your trip, you arrive in front of a dilapidated bridge above a enormous chasm.

:bridge_at_night: Take a risk crossing the bridge
:walking: Find another way forward.

*- Use the reactions for make an action :warning: Not answering is also considered an action!*
events.22:
: ** :apple: As you walk through a farmer's property, you see an apple tree with very appetizing fruit. 

:euro: Go buy fruit from this man
:busts_in_silhouette: Go steal fruit from the tree
:runner: Don't worry about it

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is consided a separate choice!*
events.23:
: ** :walking: You walk through the forest, when suddenly you see a cart that looks broken. Around, a group of people seems to be in bad shape.

:hammer: Help these people repair their cart.
:runner: Don't worry about these individuals, they seem suspicious!

*-Use reaction to make an action :warning: Not responding is consided a separate choice!*
events.24:
: ** :fireworks: You're going up a hill. As you look around, you see lights in the distance. As you get closer, you also hear music. It's a festival! Excited to party, you run to the city.

:dart: Go to a game stand
:circus_tent: Go to an item stand
:oden: Go to a food stand 

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.25:
: ** :mag_right: As you wander around, you come across a battlefield, in the surrounding area, you notice several soldiers looking for possible survivors of a massacre.

:handshake: Offer to help
:spy: Steal bodies
:walking: Don't help them

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.26:
: ** :walking: While walking through a village, you notice a group of people. Up close, you quickly notice a hanging in progress. After some discussion, you learn this person is sentenced to death for "words contrary to the values of the church"

:money_with_wings: Steal from the audience.
:punch: Stand in the way to prevent the man from dying.
:walking: Continue on your journey peacefully

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.27:
: ** :walking: Walking through the small village you found, you notice a well with a small shiny object at the bottom.

:point_down: Try to descend and retrieve the object.
:handshake: Try to grab the object with the well's bucket
:walking: Continue on your journey

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.28:
: ** :angel: On your journey, a group of men "preaching the word of the Gods", invites you to join their cause. 

:white_check_mark: Agree to join them
:x: Gently reject the proposal.

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.29:
: ** :thermometer: In this period when temperatures exceed 90¬∞F, you get tired, so you decide to look for a way to relax and get back in shape. 

:mag: Search the surroundings for a body of water
:deciduous_tree: Rest at the foot of a tree
:zzz: Rest right here

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*
events.30:
: ** :european_castle: You see a castle in the distance. You decide to approach the main entrance, it seems to be that of Duke Benatis. Known for his banana farms, he organizes a party for his 21st birthday. When you approach a little closer, a guard invites you to enter as the Duke wants everyone to participate in the party. When you return, you see a huge feast awaiting the attendees.

:prince: Go to the Duke
:tada: Stay at the party
:gift: Give him a present
:banana: Go and steal bananas from his farm

*-Use the reactions to take an action. :warning: Not reacting is also considered a choice!*

nothingToSay.1: ** | :smiley: No incidents or significant events to report.
nothingToSay.2: ** | :smiley: Nothing special happened since the previous report.
nothingToSay.3: ** | :smiley: You haven't encountered any difficulty in your progress during the last few hours, and you continue to progress quietly.
nothingToSay.4: ** | :smiley: Nothing to report, you keep moving forward.
nothingToSay.5: ** | :smiley: No obstacles in sight, nothing seems to be against you right now. You keep moving forward.
nothingToSay.6: ** | :smiley: The way is clear, no reason to stop, you keep moving forward
nothingToSay.7: ** | :smiley: Nothing significant has happened since the previous report.
nothingToSay.8: ** | :smiley: No significant events since last time.
nothingToSay.9: ** | :smiley: The dogs bark and the caravan passes by. You continue quietly on your way
nothingToSay.10: ** | :smiley: The princess got closer to you! At least that's the impression you got... You carry on.

ü§î.1: ** | :joy: Don't worry, everything will be fine! Here are 100 points :medal: to start your adventure! Use the `profile` command to see your points :wink: I'll let you discover the different commands! Feel free to request regular reports!

üö∂.1: ** | :smirk: I like this determination! Here're 100 points :medal: to start your adventure! Use the command `profile` to see your points :wink: I'll let you discover the other commands! Don't hesitate to check your reports regularly!

end.1: ** | : x: The tutorial hasn't been finished! You can restart it when you want using the `report` command!

‚úÇ.1: ** | :scissors: Felling this tree took half an hour!

üö∂.1: ** | :walking: Finding another way seemed to be a good decision, you didn't waste any time!
üö∂.2: ** | :walking: Going down another path seemed like a good solution, unfortunately you got hurt while taking it.

end.1: ** | :scissors: The tree has been cut down and the road is clear. Unfortunately, looters have stolen everything you collected since the last report!

üèÉ.1: ** | :runner: After 15 minutes of chasing you manage to lose the dog, he didn't seem very friendly!
üèÉ.2: ** | :runner: When you try fleeing, you suddenly fall into a ditch. The injury is serious... You'll have to get better before you continue! :sick:

üêï.1: ** | :dog2: You lose track of the dog after a few minutes, he was going too fast!
üêï.2: ** | :dog2: You lose track of the dog after a few minutes next to a tree. Looking around you, you discover a lot of small coins scattered all over the place!

end.1: ** :dog: You made the decision to not move, the dog must've not liked it because it bit you before running away!

‚õè.1: ** | :pick: After wasting 30 minutes breaking the lock, you discover that the chest is empty!
‚õè.2: ** | :pick: After wasting 30 minutes breaking the lock, you discover that the chest is empty!
‚õè.3: ** | :pick: After wasting 15 minutes breaking the lock, you find 6 gold coins!

üîë.1: ** | :key: After about fifty minutes of searching, you finally find the key! Burried next to the chest, you now can open the chest and find 100 Gold Coins!
üîë.2: ** | :key: After spending one hour searching for the key, you end giving up and carry on, without opening the chest.
üîë.3: ** | :key: After about fourty minutes of searching, you finally find the key! Buried next to the chest, it's so damaged you can't even use it! You end giving up and carry on.
üîë.4: ** | :key: After twenty minutes digging everywhere around the chest, you give up and carry on.
üîë.5: ** | :key: After spending two hours searching for the key, you give up and carry on without opening the chest.

‚ñ∂.1: ** | :arrow_forward: You continue on your way; robbery is wrong, and this chest is not yours!
‚ñ∂.2: ** | :arrow_forward: You decide not to get closer to the little chest; it's a stop not worth losing precious time over

end.1: ** | :arrow_forward: It's surely a trap! In any case, there's no way you're getting any closer to that chest! You calmly continue on your way.

üó£.1: ** | :speaking_head: You make a wish and close your eyes... When you open them back up, you discover a bag filled with money in front of you! Spending those 10 minutes was worth it!
üó£.2: ** | :speaking_head: You make a wish and close your eyes... When you open them back up you don't discover anything! After wasting 10 minutes on nothing you walk away.
üó£.3: ** :speaking_head: You make a wish and close your eyes... When you reopen them, you discover that nothing happened! After waiting 10 minutes for nothing, you leave.
üó£.4: ** | :speaking_head: You make a wish and close your eyes... Reopening them, you discover... nothing at all! After waiting 10 minutes for nothing, you leave.
üó£.5: ** | :speaking_head: You make a wish and close your eyes... It's usually better not to keep walking with your eyes closed. You hurt yourself stumbling on a rock and lose 10 minutes before being able to continue.

üèÉ.1: ** | :runner: You continue on your way without paying attention to the shooting star, you didn't waste any time!
üèÉ.2: ** | :runner: You continue on without paying any more attention to the phenomenon, but you keep watching the sky with admiration... Distracted, you don't immediately notice the huge crevasse in front of you! You end up crushed at the bottom of the hole, shaken and shocked, but you reassure yourself by realizing you aren't too critically injured!

end.1: ** | :runner: You continue on your way without paying attention to the shooting star, you didn't waste any time!

üí¶.1: ** | :sweat_drops: It feels good to rest sometimes... these 30 minutes of rest have been beneficial!
üí¶.2: ** | :sweat_drops: It feels good to rest sometimes... but don't forget to move on! After wasting 3 hours resting, you are back on the road.

üö∂.1: ** | :walking: It's sometimes good to not be too lazy. You haven't wasted any time!
üö∂.2: ** | :walking: No time to rest! There's a princess to save!
üö∂.3: ** | :walking: You make the choice to not stop and continue forward.
üö∂.4: ** | :walking: You continue your adventure without paying any more attention to this fountain
üö∂.5: ** | :zzz: You have to know to rest when you are tired. Exhausted, you collapse a few minutes after passing the fountain. You have to sleep before you can continue!

end.1: ** | :money_mouth: You spent a good hour picking up the scattered pieces from the bottom of the water, but it seems to have been worth it!

üî¶.1: ** | :flashlight: You get quickly lost in the maze, but you end up coming out of it after a few hours!
üî¶.2: ** | :flashlight: You spend a few minutes exploring the cave from top to bottom and find an object which may be useful... !
üî¶.3: ** | :flashlight: The cave quickly turns out to be a dead end, but when you come out, you hit your head on the ceiling and get dizzy! You'll have to be treated! :confounded:

üèÉ.1: ** | :runner: You're not the type to risk wasting time on meaningless explorations! You finish eating and move on.

üîç.1: ** | :mag: After 30 minutes you finally discover a strange object...
üîç.2: ** | :mag: After 60 minutes you end up abandoning your search without having discovered anything...
üîç.3: ** | :mag: As you began your search, you drop a large bag of coins at the bottom of a large hole! It's not possible to recover it...
üîç.4: ** | :mag: As you were looking for things to pick up, a huge branch fell off the tree next to you and fell onto your leg! You can get up sound, but you'll have to go to the hospital! :confounded:

end.1: ** | :clock1030: um... It seems you've been sitting there doing nothing longer than expected!

üö™.1: ** | :door: By forcing the door open, you seriously hurt yourself, you must absolutely be healed! :sick:
üö™.2: ** | :door: After spending almost an hour trying to get into the house, you give up. Leaving, you find an object which may be useful!
üö™.3: ** | :door: You enter the house and put down your things to rest. Taken by a deep sleep, you will need to rest before continuing your adventure. :zzz:
üö™.4: ** | :door: You enter the house and search around for about fifteen minutes. On leaving, you find an object that may be useful to you!
üö™.5: ** | :door: You enter the house and search around for about fifteen minutes. You end up abandoning your search without finding anything.

üö∂.1: ** | :walking: You continue on your way without worrying about the house.

end.1: ** | :walking: You spent almost fifteen minutes without moving, it's time to go back!

üå≤.1: ** | üå≤ You cross the forest without too many difficulties, and continue your journey!
üå≤.2: ** | üå≤ You walk slowly through the firs. On the way, you pick up fir branches and make small objects you can use or sell...
üå≤.3: ** | üå≤ You are progressing slowly through the forest. Unfortunately, the ground is slippery and you fall to the bottom of a ditch! You manage to come back out but you're hurt! :sick:

üèû.1: ** | üèû You finally change your mind and decide to stay on the plains. While less dangerous, this path is also longer, so you lose a lot of time!
üèû.2: ** | üèû You finally change your mind and decide to stay on the plains. While less dangerous, this path is also longer, so you lose a lot of time! After a few kilometers, you stop to rest in an inn.

end.1: ** | :walking: You rest for a few minutes before slowly leaving for the passes. You end up getting exhausted on the other side, you will have to rest before leaving! :zzz:

üîé.1: ** | :mag_right: After a quarter hour looking, you find the pitchfork next to a pile of hay. To thank you, the farmer offers you some coins.
üîé.2: ** | :mag_right: After half an hour of searching, you can not find the pitchfork. You discover, however, an object that may be useful to you!
üîé.3: ** | :mag_right: Looking for the pitchfork, you step on it and get a nasty cut. :sick:
üîé.4: ** | :mag_right: You look for the pitchfork for almost an hour, but you can't find it. You leave the peasant politely and continue your journey

‚ñ∂.1: ** | :walking: You continue your way without paying attention to the peasant.
‚ñ∂.2: ** | :arrow_right: Continuing through the field, you fall on the pitchfork, severely cutting your foot. :sick:

end.1: ** | :walking: You stare blankly for 15 minutes as the farmer looks for his pitchfork before leaving.

üé£.1: ** | :walking: The man politely refuses your help, and you continue on your journey.
üé£.2: ** | :tropical_fish: Thanks to you, the man catches a superb fish weighing in at 3 kg! To thank you, he offers you something that could be useful to you ...
üé£.3: ** |  :sweat_drops: The fish at the end of the line must be huge! You find yourself quickly pulled down to the bottom of the water! You are saved just in time by the fisherman. Stunned by this adventure, you will have to heal before continuing! :confounded:

üèÉ.1: ** | :runner: You don't have even a minute to lose to help a fisherman! You go your way.

üñê.1: ** | :hand_splayed: But why did you do that? :thinking: Feeling remorse, you rescue the poor man and offer him some coins as compensation.

end.1: ** | :walking: You end up continuing on without paying any more attention to this rather boring situation!

üå≥.1: ** | :deciduous_tree: You get lost for several hours in the forest but find your way out without damage.
üå≥.2: ** | :deciduous_tree: You waste a lot of time moving through the forest, but you finally succeed in crossing it! When you come out, you pick up an object that may be useful to you!
üå≥.3: ** | :deciduous_tree: While crossing the forest, you take a big fall into a ditch. The injury is serious, you absolutely have to heal yourself! :sick:

üëà.2: ** | :deciduous_tree: You fall into a trap! After stealing all you possess, the thieves fly away, like cowards. Deeply hurt, you fall unconscious. :sick:

üëâ.1: ** | :walking: You're not sure why you took a route 10 times longer than you originally planned, but you finally arrived at the right place.

end.1: ** | :walking: After spending several minutes chatting with the mysterious woman you end up leaving. Following her directions, you arrive safely at the other end of the forest.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ You decide to go in another direction, but it takes you an entire hour to find a direction that suits you!

üèä.1: ** | üèä The water is frozen over! You motivate yourself and dive. Once on the other side, you realize your mistake. You are freezing and weakened. You will need to heal before continuing! :snowflake:
üèä.2: ** | üèä You reach the other side easily, and arrive at the village. People greet you and give you food.

üö£.1: ** | üö£ When trying to build the raft you hurt yourself! You decide to forget building it after spending several hours on it and leave in another direction.
üö£.2: ** | üö£ After spending several hours building your raft, you start to cross the river... and sink miserably in the middle. The water is freezing, but you barely reach the other side, freezing and weakened. You will need to be treated before you can continue! :snowflake:
üö£.3: ** | üö£ You build a small raft in a few hours and reach the other side easily. When you leave your raft, you pick up an object that, if you don't use, will be easy to sell!

üåâ.1: ** | üåâ After 30 minutes you finally give up and continue on your way in another direction...
üåâ.2: ** | üåâ After 60 minutes, you finally find a river crossing. You decide not to go to the village, now too far away, and continue your journey in another direction.
üåâ.3: ** | üåâ After a few minutes you find a little wooden bridge. You quickly reach the village where the locals, happy to meet a stranger for the first time in years, offer you some coins.
üåâ.4: ** | üåâ After a while you finally discover a wooden bridge. Sadly, it is in very bad condition because it has not been used for a long time. After you cross half the bridge, it collapses. You manage to cross the river but you are completely soaked. Confounded by this mishap, you will need to rest before continuing! :confounded:

end.1: ** | :clock1030: After a few hours on the riverside, you finally walk away in a random direction.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂You cross the little village in just half an hour and continue on your way.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ You lose a good hour going around the town but calmly continue on your way.

üè†.1: ** | üè† After talking with the innkeeper for 2 hours, you finally learn there are no rooms available tonight! You continue on your way, frustrated you couldn't enjoy a good night's rest.
üè†.2: ** | üè† You pay for a room for the night and fall down on the bed. You will need to sleep before resuming the adventure :zzz:
üè†.3: ** | üè† The inn looks like it's been abandoned for many years... You continue on your way without asking yourself any more questions.

üî®.1: ** | üî® There's nothing interesting in this forge... You quickly leave the place and continue on your way.
üî®.2: ** | üî® While trying a sword, you broke the smithy's window! The blacksmith asks for recompensation!
üî®.3: ** | üî®No one is present at the forge, which seems to have been abandoned for years. Before leaving, however, you notice an object that could be useful to you for the rest of your adventure...
üî®.4: ** | üî® The forge looks like it's been abandoned for many years, so you continue on your way.
üî®.5: ** | üî®You enter and greet the blacksmith. After a quick inspection of his work, you understand you won't find anything interesting here. You go back on your way.

üé™.1: ** | üé™You explore the market for 30 minutes before discovering a small object on the ground that could be useful to you...
üé™.2: ** | üé™ After wasting 60 minutes strolling through the stalls, you end up leaving the city without having found anything interesting.
üé™.3: ** | üé™ Your vigilance was at its lowest at the market. You were hit hard on the back of the head and fell to the ground... you remember nothing after that. You'll have to get better before you can keep moving forward! üòµ

end.1: ** | üö∂ You visit the city for many hours before continuing your journey.

üî®.1: ** | üî® The man sees you and suggests that you make an object with him. After almost an hour, your creation is finished. The man offers it to you as a reward!
üî®.2: ** | üî® You watch the worker make an axe for about ten minutes before you decide to hit the road again.
üî®.3: ** | üî® The worker sees you and suggests that you make a sword with him. Enthusiastic about getting a new weapon, you accept. You don't take long to clumsily drop your heavy creation onto your foot. Seriously wounded, you give up the idea of creating your own weapon. :dizzy_face: !

üõè.1: ** | üõè After a quick chat with the man, he agrees to take you in for the night. Exhausted, you collapse from fatigue on the bed :zzz:
üõè.2: ** | üõè The man quickly admits he can't accommodate you for the night, but offers to share his meal with you. You politely refuse and go back on your way.
üõè.3: ** | üõè You only get a simple growl in response. The residents of the region seem to dislike foreigners
üõè.4: ** | üõè The man quickly refuses to share his bed with you but offers to share his dinner with you. Hungry and exhausted, you accept his offer.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ You leave without wasting any time.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ You continue on your way around the meadow.
üö∂.3: ** | üö∂ You decide to continue walking despite the fatigue. After a few miles, you collapse at the side of the road. :sick:

end.1: ** | üö∂ You go around the house and continue your journey.

üë•.1: ** | üë• You chat for a moment with these friendly merchants who decided to trade with you!
üë•.2: ** | üë• Unfortunately for you, the group of merchants has nothing to sell, so you go on your way.
üë•.3: ** | üë• Less welcoming than you expected, the group of men quickly surrounds you and, through treats, relieves you of a few coins before running away!
üë•.4: ** | üë• You should have trusted your intuition and refused this "good deal"... The beautiful diamond sword you were promised looks more like a soft foam sword. You quickly retrace your steps but the door to the shop seems definitively closed! Swearing never to be duped again, you go back on your way.

üèÉ.1: ** | üèÉ There's still a long way to go, no time to stop!
üèÉ.2: ** | üèÉ You continue without stopping, walking through the small streets. At the corner of one of them, you are savagely pushed by a man who quickly flees. :confounded:

üí∞.1: ** | üí∞ You pick up a few coins and flee as quickly as possible without feeling any remorse.
üí∞.2: ** | üí∞ Unfortunately, there's nothing to steal. However, your attempt did not go unnoticed! Shame on you, you give the owners back their coin and head back to the main road.
üí∞.3: ** | üí∞ Caught red-handed! Faced with five men of imposing stature, you bitterly regret your unfortunate act. You leave, feeling groggy after paying compensation. :confounded:

end.1: ** | üö∂ You spend a long time watching them set up their camp, before coming to your senses and continuing on your journey.

üîé.1: ** | üîé Shortly after entering the castle, you realize how unsanitary the place is. Abandoned for years, the building is totally damaged. After a few minutes of exploration, you enter a large, ruined room, as a huge piece of the ceiling falls onto you! With great difficulty, you manage to get out of the building.
üîé.2: ** | üîé You enter the castle and quickly walk through the area. After a few minutes, you find a room that looks like the old armory. In a hurry to get out of the building, you pick up the first object that falls into your hands and get like a bat out of hell!
üîé.3: ** | üîé It seems that this castle is less abandoned than it looks! Shortly after your entrance you hear many noises coming from different rooms. Not reassured, you prefer to go back on your way.

‚û°.1: ** | You carry on with your adventure without worrying about the castle

üîÅ.1: ** | üîÅ You go around the castle but you can't find anything. Believing you wasted enough time, you continue your way.
üîÅ.2: ** | üîÅ This sweep doesn't tell you much about the big building. However, you discover a large number of small gold coins scattered around the castle. Happy with your discovery, you head back on your way.
üîÅ.3: ** | üîÅ As you began to walk around the castle, you accidentally fell into a hole. Slightly injuring your leg, this sweep will cost you a lot of time! :sick:

end.1: ** | üö∂ After admiring the building for about fifteen minutes, you go back on your way.
end.2: ** | üö∂ You enjoy the view of the castle.... Then finally remember your quest and go back on your way.

üçé.1: ** | üçé You climb as high as you can and pick fruit. You quickly satisfy your hunger and feel your strength revitalised by this sugary boost.
üçé.2: ** | üçé As you were about to pick fruit from the top of the tree, the branch supporting you snaps under your weight! Stunned by your fall, you decide to give up on your meal and go back on your way. :confounded:
üçé.3: ** | üçé You quickly pick fruit and eagerly take a large bite... It's only a few hours later you realize your mistake. :sick:

üçÑ.1: ** | üçÑ As you bend down to pick up the mushrooms, you see a strange object shining on the ground...
üçÑ.2: ** | üçÑ You pick a few mushrooms before you notice that you have nothing to cook them with. Abandoning the hunt, you go back to the road.
üçÑ.3: ** | üçÑ You bite into a red mushroom with small white dots... and quickly regret this action! :dizzy_face:

ü•ó.1: ** | ü•ó You pick a small amount and eat your meal. With the energy provided by it, you head back on your way.
ü•ó.2: ** | ü•ó After some research, you don't really find any plants satisfying your hunger, so head back on your way without eating anything.
ü•ó.3: ** | ü•ó You quickly change your mind. While looking around, you discover thick vegetation preventing you from gathering anything. Without wasting any more time, you continue on your journey.

ü¶å.1: ** | ü¶å With no animals in sight, you continue your journey without further delay
ü¶å.2: ** | ü¶å After a long frantic chase with a wild animal, it stops fleeing and charges you furiously. Stunned by the force of the attack, you are unable to dodge and suffer the beast's wrath. Seriously injured, it will take time before you can resume your adventure :dizzy_face:
ü¶å.3: ** | ü¶å You quickly stab some critters with your blade and eat your prey with great hunger before continuing on your journey, full.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ You continue your journey without wasting any more time.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ You decide to not eat, but eventually regret this decision a few hours later. Hungry, you decide to take a little nap before getting back on the road. :zzz:

end.1: ** | üö∂ After a few moments of reflection you decide to quickly continue on your journey.
end.2: ** | üö∂ You look for another food source, but after a long search you realize that there aren't any food sources. Not convinced by the options available to you, you go back on your way.

üîé.1: ** | üîé You search for 30 minutes, but you find nothing of interest.
üîé.2: ** | üîé After 40 minutes of searching, you finally find something which could be useful!
üîé.3: ** | üîé While searching a toolbox, you cut yourself on some rusty pliers. It's very deep!:sick:

‚õì.1: ** | ‚õì You climb to the top of the scaffolding, but except for a beautiful landscape, you find nothing. After spending a few minutes admiring it, you leave.
‚õì.2: ** | ‚õì Climbing the unstable structure, you discover a breathtaking view of the region!
‚õì.3: ** | ‚õì You climb the ladder, but when you reach the halfway point, a bar breaks, and you fall to the ground! Shaken from the fall, you slowly come to your senses. :confounded:

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ You decide to ignore the site and you continue on your way
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ You observe the site from a distance, without seeing the pickaxe on the ground. You cut your foot on it leaving. :confounded:

end.1: ** | üö∂ You observe the construction site for a few minutes, then you realize it's completely deserted. You're head back on your way.

üçΩ.1: ** | üçΩ Considering your poor cooking skills, you should've expected it, but you get sick soon after tasting your meal. :sick:
üçΩ.2: ** | üçΩ Despite your reduced cooking skills, your fox on the spit satiates you well.
üçΩ.3: ** | üçΩ You approach the fox to pick him up, when all of a sudden, he jumps up and bites you! You run away, injured in your stomach and your heels.
üçΩ.4: ** | üçΩ You cooked this fox surprisingly well. After eating it, you feel refreshed.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ You choose to ignore this corpse and don't lose any time.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ You choose to ignore the fox and not waste time... but as soon as you pass him, the fox gets up and bites you violently!

üî™.1: ** | üî™ You approach the fox and butcher him. You sell his fur to the first wandering merchant you meet.
üî™.2: ** | üî™ You butcher the fox and go in search of a way to sell his skin. A few minutes later, you meet a merchant who offers to trade it for one of his quality items, and you accept.
üî™.3: ** | üî™ You butcher the fox and look for a place to sell his fur. Unfortunately, it rots very quickly, and flies begin to swarm you. You end up leaving him by the side of the road, but it seems you still fell ill!

end.1: ** | üëÄ For a few seconds you consider the beast on the ground, hesitating. Finally, you continue on your way.

üëä.1: ** | üëä You succeed in knocking out the guard and taking the precious object he was carrying
üëä.2: ** | üëä At the last moment, the guard turns around and attacks you. However, he leaves you alive.
üëä.3: ** | üëä The guard dodges, and the woman manages to escape. She finds you further away, out of danger, thanking you with some gold coins.

üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ As you pass by, you fall to the ground.

ü§ô.1: ** | ü§ô The guards follow you and arrest the corrupt guard. The woman gives you an object as a token of her appreciation.
ü§ô.2: ** | ü§ô The guards, also being criminals, strike you on your hip, but leave you alive.

end.1: ** | üö∂ You continue your journey without paying attention to the guard.
end.2: ** | üö∂ Dazed, you watch the scene for five minutes. The guard finally notices you, so you hurry on.

üåâ.1: ** | üåâ The bridge seems unsafe, but you have no time to waste, so cross. After 5 minutes on the bridge you reach the end, safe and sound.
üåâ.2: ** | üåâ While crossing the bridge you see a small sack. When you open it, you notice a large amount of coins
üåâ.3: ** | üåâ While crossing the bridge, you hear some small cracks, and suddenly, a plank snaps and falls, and you with it. :nauseated_face:
üåâ.4: ** | üåâ While crossing, a plank snaps out from under you. Fortunately, you manage to hang on to another, more reliable board. After a few minutes spent recovering your emotions, you continue on your way.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ After a good hour of walking, you find another bridge that looks in much better shape, and you decide to take it.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ During your journey, you notice a little crate and open it. Inside, you find an object that appears to be useful. You take it and continue on your way.
üö∂.3: ** | üö∂ You notice a bridge and rush to cross it as quickly as possible. However, you stumble on a trunk and injure yourself. :confounded:

end.1: ** | üïë You wait about twenty minutes, observing this bridge. Then, you continue your journey.
end.2: ** | üö∂ No time to waste! You continue on your way without worrying about this dangerous path.

üí∂.1: ** | üí∂ You approach the farmer and ask him for fruit. He gives you some in exchange for a few coins. About fifteen minutes later, you notice they were poisoned and fall to the ground. :nauseated_face:
üí∂.2: ** | üí∂ The farmer agrees to sell you 2 apples for a few coins. After leaving, you eat them, regaining your energy.
üí∂.3: ** | üí∂ The farmer refuses to sell you fruit, so you continue on your way without wasting any more time.

üë•.1: ** | üë• After a few minutes spent here, you leave with some fruit. You decide to make a profit by selling them in the next village.
üë•.2: ** | üë• The farmer realizes your presence in his fields, and beats you up.
üë•.3: ** | üë• After eating some fruit, you leave, having regained your energy.
üë•.4: ** | üë• The farmer quickly notices your attempt, and catches you. After retrieving his fruits, he asks you for compensation.

üèÉ.1: ** | üèÉ You carry on with your adventure without worrying about the fruit, however appetizing they may seem.

end.1: ** | üëÄ You watch the tree for about twenty minutes, then leave.
end.2: ** | üëÄ The farmer sees you, and offers you some fruit you willingly accept.

üî®.1: ** | üî® You decide to come closer and help them. After spending 45 minutes helping them, these individuals thank you and give you money
üî®.2: ** | üî® You spend almost an hour repairing their cart. Once it's repaired, the group of people ambushes you, and steals part of your belongings.
üî®.3: ** | üî® You repair their cart quickly. Happy, they thank you and offer you a gift that will surely serve you for the rest of your journey.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ You have no intention of wasting any time, and continue on your journey.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ When you leave, you stumble into a hole and hurt yourself. :nauseated_face:

end.1: ** | üëÄ You spend 15 minutes watching them and decide to continue your journey without paying any more attention.

üéØ.1: ** | üéØ You play this game several times but never succeed in getting your prize back. Disappointed with your performance, you pay the manager and leave.
üéØ.2: ** | üéØ You play this game again and again for a long time, but with no luck. However, since the manager became friends with you, he'll partially refund you. You leave with a warm thanks.
üéØ.3: ** | üéØ You managed to win the jackpot! Happy and jumping with excitement, you pick it up and get out of town.

üé™.1: ** | üé™ For hours you search for the object you want, but no one has it. To avoid buying anything useless, you ultimately decide to buy nothing at all.
üé™.2: ** | üé™ There it is! You've been looking for this object for days and you finally found it! You buy it quickly without paying attention to the price and then leave.

üç¢.1: ** | üç¢ This food is incredible! You've never eaten anything so good in your entire life. You feel invigorated and relaxed.
üç¢.2: ** | üç¢ This food is strange. As soon as you eat it, you get a headache, begin hallucinating, and feel nausea. You were poisoned! From the smile of your cook, there is no doubt about it. You throw the poison back up onto the table, but you're not sure if you threw it all up.
üç¢.3: ** | üç¢ This food is rather standard. You don't feel anything while eating it or after you finish it. You quickly forget the taste

end.1: ** | üö∂ None of the stands interest you and you quickly leave the city after a few looks.
end.2: ** | üö∂ You decide to not buy anything, but you still spend a long time between the stands.

ü§ù.1: ** | ü§ù You decide to go to the soldiers, and offer them your help looking for survivors. After 45 minutes of help, a soldier offers you some money to thank you for your precious help.
ü§ù.2: ** | ü§ù When you go looking for survivors, you get attacked by looters! After struggling, you run and continue on your way.

üïµ.1: ** | üïµ You decide to go around the soldiers, and go loot the bodies of the deceased to make yourself that tiny bit richer.
üïµ.2: ** | üïµ By looting the bodies, you get caught brutally by a soldier. You immediately return what you collected before quickly continuing on your journey.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ You don't look at the massacre that took place, instead going a little further to rest.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ No time to lose ! You continue your journey.
üö∂.3: ** | üö∂ In a hurry to continue your journey, you trip on a lifeless body, and get hurt. :nauseated_face:

end.1: ** | üëÄ You stay and watch the soldiers for about fifteen minutes, then continue on your way.
end.2: ** | üëÄ Tired, you fall sound asleep on the ground. :zzz:

üí∏.1: ** | üí∏ After robbing a few people, you leave with an object that seems very interesting! After walking for about 30 minutes, you look at what it is.
üí∏.2: ** | üí∏ You're about to steal from a resident when, suddenly, he turns around and grabs you with a strong grip before kicking you. After a fight, you run away.

üëä.1: ** | üëä After struggling to get through the crowd, you intervene as quickly as possible and manage to get the man out of there. After running through the village, the man, very grateful, offers you an object that will serve you for the rest of your adventure.
üëä.2: ** | üëä Passing through the crowd, you try to prevent this death, but get ambushed and fall to the ground.
üëä.3: ** | üëä After succeeding in leaving the site with the man, you get caught and beat up by a group of people. After initially feeling relieved, you notice these people have stolen from you.
üëä.4: ** | üëä After trying to violently intervene, the executioner grabs you by force. You're struggling, but nothing can change that. You, in turn, are sentenced to death. :skull:

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ Horrified by this act of barbarity, you quickly continue on your journey.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ During your run, you see an open box in the distance. After a few minutes of walking, you discover a bag full of money inside it.

end.1: ** | üëÄ After spending 15 minutes watching this scene, you leave, shocked, but continue your adventure.

üëá.1: ** | üëá You get seriously injured during the descent and get stuck at the bottom for several hours before someone finds you.
üëá.2: ** | üëá You arrive at the bottom without any problems, get the object, and continue your journey.
üëá.3: ** | üëá You jump into the well but find nothing, so you go back up without wasting any more time.
üëá.4: ** | üëá Once you get to the bottom, you discover a large quantity of gold coins that you collect before continuing your journey.

ü§ù.1: ** | ü§ù After an hour of trying, you finally get this object, which turns out to be a simple piece of metal.
ü§ù.2: ** | ü§ù Focused on your goal, you don't realize that a young villager catches you, and pushes you into the well. Stunned, you wake up several hours later. :confounded:
ü§ù.3: ü§ù | Quickly, you get the money from the bottom of the well, and continue your journey.

üö∂.1: ** | üö∂ No time to lose! You continue your journey without paying any attention to this.
üö∂.2: ** | üö∂ You continue on your way, but after a short while walking, you encounter a group of people dressed in black. After struggling hard, you manage to leave, but you have been robbed.

end.1: ** | üëÄ You blankly stare at the object for 20 minutes, then leave.
end.2: ** | üö∂ Leaning over the well, you observe the object. It is then that you fall over. Fortunately, you manage to quickly climb back up, but you emerge from this adventure seriously injured. :nauseated_face:

‚úÖ.1: ** | ‚úÖ You join them... and lose 3 hours attending a religious ceremony.
‚úÖ.2: ** | ‚úÖ You join them.... but decide to leave after 30 minutes, realizing you still have a princess to save, and that you don't have more time to devote to faith
‚úÖ.3: ** | ‚úÖ Noticing your lack of sensitivity to their speech, the group gets aggressive! It takes you several minutes to escape from them, but not without being hit a few times.
‚úÖ.4: ** | ‚úÖ You join them, then leave just as quickly, stealing an object that may be useful to you.

‚ùå.1: ** | ‚ùå You cut the conversation short and continue your journey.
‚ùå.2: ** | ‚ùå The group quickly becomes aggressive in the face of your refusal. Finally, you find yourself forced to listen to them talk for a long while to avoid taking any more blows.

end.1: ** | üö∂ Faced with your bliss, the group quickly tires, and goes to meet another passerby.

üîç.1: ** | üîç You remember passing by a lake, so you go there. When you get there, you enjoy a swim that feels great. You're now refreshed, and in better shape to continue on your journey across the country.
üîç.2: ** | üîç You remember passing by a lake, so you go there... on the way, you find an item that will surely be useful to you. When you arrive, you enjoy a swim that feels great. You are now refreshed, and in better shape to continue your journey across the country.
üîç.3: ** | üîç You look for a body of water in vain.... Because of this fatigue, you fall ill :zzz:

üå≥.1: ** | üå≥ You discover a shadowed area under the trees, and decide to go there. After a short hour of sleep, you leave and continue on your way.
üå≥.2: ** | üå≥ You go to a shaded area where you can rest. But when you wake up, you notice you've been stripped of your belongings.

üí§.1: ** | üí§ You rest, however, the floor is very uncomfortable
üí§.2: ** | üí§ After your rest, you leave feeling more motivated than ever

end.1: ** | üëÄ You stay where you belong in full sunlight for about 15 minutes, then collapse
end.2: ** | üö∂ You decide to use your reserves, and continue your journey to not waste time

ü§¥.1: ** | ü§¥ You go to the Duke and compliment him. The Duke thanks you and decides to offer you some rest at his castle.
ü§¥.2: ** | ü§¥ You go see the Duke and compliment him. The Duke thanks you and decides to offer you a few coins, telling you to make good use of them, then you go back on your way.
ü§¥.3: ** | ü§¥ You go to the Duke and try to compliment him, but rhetoric is not your forte and as the Duke gets offended, he locks you up..

üéâ.1: ** | üéâ You go home and enjoy a party that is going to last for a while
üéâ.2: ** | üéâ The guard sees your dirty shoes and asks you to come back with something more appropriate. Luckily, a young beggar standing right next to you offers to shine them for you. This way, you can enjoy the birthday party.
üéâ.3: ** | üéâ The party buffet is a feast. You enjoy all these bananas.

üéÅ.1: ** | üéÅ You feel like giving a gift to Duke Benatis, but you can't find anything that would do the trick. You decide to simply give him some of the money you've collected during your adventures. The Duke accepts your gift
üéÅ.2: ** | üéÅ You approach the Duke to give him a gift. Seeing you arrive, the Duke understands your intention and tells you kindly that it's not necessary, so you just chat with him and then leave the party.
üéÅ.3: ** | üéÅ As you go to give a gift to the Duke, the Duke stands up and declares that he has decided to distribute gifts to everyone present. You understand that it would then be useless to give him one, and accept the one handed to you by the servants.

üçå.1: ** | üçå As you're about to leave the farm with your loot, a slave alerts the others and shames you. You end up locked in a cell...
üçå.2: ** | üçå You discreetly come out with your delicious loot that joins your stomach swiftly.
üçå.3: ** | üçå To your great misfortune, you didn't notice the writing "Unfit for sale" in front of your freshly acquired bananas and they quickly make you sick! :nauseated_face:

end.1: ** | üö∂ You don't feel like partying today, so you decide to turn back and continue your journey quietly.
end.2: ** | üö∂ You're not ready to party today, so you go back on the road. When you stumble and come face to face with a banana, but it doesn't seem to be any good.
